short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productivity enhancements for Toggl time tracking

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Toggl Productivity Pack provides enhancements for the Toggl time tracking service.

Enhancements

 - Select All / None links in person, project and tag report filters.
